Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $36.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:23:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Original Rollerblade Style Office Chair Wheels, Safe for All Floors.

1 Safe for All Floors 2 Hardwood 3 Carpet 4 Laminate / Vinyl / Tile

Universal Size – Fits 98% of All Office Chairs

These chair casters are the universal size and fit 98% of all office chairs on the market. If they don’t fit your specific chair, no problem, we’ll take care of you.

Quick & Easy Installation

No tools required at all! Simply pull out your old caster wheels and pop in the new ones. Replacing your chair wheels is easy and takes less than 30 seconds.

Our Lifetime Promise to You

Our lifetime promise has no expiration. So if you EVER have any issues with your new chair casters, we’ll send you a brand new set.

The ORIGINAL Rollerblade Style Chair Wheels!

We were the first to introduce rollerblade style wheels for office chair, way back in 2016. Designed in the USA, we continue to evolve and improve these office chair wheels.

The Office Oasis Featured on PBS Show ‘StartUP’

The co-founders of The Office Oasis, Meredith and Kevin, were featured on the PBS show StartUp. They shared their story on how they started a growing e-commerce business with just one simple idea.

★ LIFETIME WARRANTY – Our warranty never expires, so if you EVER have any issues, we’ll send you a brand new set of wheels. There are many cheaper knock offs available, but we’re the only brand that offers and stands behind a full lifetime warranty.
★ SAFE FOR ALL FLOORS – Many chair wheels use cheap, low quality materials that destroy your flooring. We don’t. Encased with soft, polyurethane material our rollerblade style wheels are guaranteed not to scratch or leave marks on any surface (including hardwood, carpet, tile, laminate and more).
★ QUICK AND EASY INSTALLATION – No tools required! Easily remove and replace the wheels in your desk chair in less than 30 seconds. Simply pull out your old caster wheels and pop these in. Check out our quick replacement video for more details.
★ UNIVERSAL SIZE – Upgrade any rolling office chair with these smooth caster wheels. The universal size stem will fit almost every office chair on the market. If for some reason they don’t fit your specific chair, we’ll give you a full refund and even pay the return shipping.
★ SUPPORTS UP TO 650 LBS – Manufactured with the best available materials these casters are built to last a lifetime. Heat treated high-grade steel, precision ball bearings, and durable polyurethane provide years of effortless rolling. The heavy duty chair wheels easily support 650 lbs.

The Office Oasis

Functional, Modern Office Essentials That Look & Feel Good

Previous page

  2. Message from the Brand Owners

    “We want you to be absolutely thrilled with your purchase. So if you ever need anything, just let us know!”

    -Meredith & Kevin

  3. Explore More

    Visit the Store

  4. As Seen on PBS

    Co-Founders Meredith and Kevin share their story on the PBS show Start Up.

  5. Our Story – We’re a small family owned business that started with one simple idea. Rollerblade wheels on office chairs so people everywhere could protect their hardwood floors.

    Our Mission – To create functional office essentials that look & feel good. Because you deserve to work in a space that you love.

    Our Promise – We’ll do everything possible to make sure you are absolutely thrilled with your purchase. No matter what, we are here for you.

Next page

5

(as of Nov 30,2022 11:23:48 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 11:08:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Series E I Office Desk Chair

Series J I Office Desk Chair

Ergonomic Desgin: Big & tall executive office chair has Double layer soft cushion can keep you away from the numbness caused by long sitting.Thickened headrest and backrest fit to the curve of human spine can give you strong support and help you release back pressure.
High-Quality Material: This executive office chair upholstered in high-quality PU leather. It’s a soft, lustrous, durable and water-proof. Comfortable cushion consis of native sponge and PP cotton, soft and resilient.
Flexible Using Style: You can flip the arms up and do things that can’t be done in other chairs, such as playing guitar or sitting cross-legged. You can also put the chair under the desk for saving space by fliping up the arms.
Adjustable Function: The pneumatic seat height adjustment can meets your different needs.Rocking backwards from 90 to 125 degree can relax you in spare time.degree. 360 degree rotation cushion and rolling swivel caster make this desk chair more flexible and convenient.
Assembly and Security: Certified by BIFMA and weight support up to 330 pounds. Besides, It’s easy to assembly, and you will not need to prepare additional tools for the assembly.
Customer Warranty Service: Hbada provides three years warranty that is processed in the most hassle-free way possible. Customer-first is the original aspiration of Hbada.No matter what problems you encounter during use, you can contact us. We will provide you with professional services on the product.

Flip-Up Armrest

Padded flip-up armrests provide a soft support and allow you to make the most of your space.

Rocking Function

Chair can be rocked front and back about 25 degree, you can have a leisurely break while sit on the chair.

Comfortable Cushion

The double-layer cushion consists of polypropylene cotton and native sponge, relieve the pain from long time sitting.

Read more

PU-leather ergonomic office chair

About this chair

An Executive chair with a high-back features a PU leather exterior to provide a timeless style that fits in nearly any room. Pneumatic, seat-height adjustment allows a variety of users to sit comfortably at their desks. 360-degree swivel allows you to effortlessly rotate the chair for added convenience.

Product description

  • Adjustable height
  • Flip-up arms
  • 360 degree swivel
  • Double layer support
  • High-end soft Pu leather

For different occassions:

  • Bedrooms
  • Office
  • Study room
  • Meeting room
  • Conference room

Read more

From the brand

Series E I Office Desk Chair

Series J I Office Desk Chair

Home Office Desk Chair – Sleek design and simple adjustment mid-back desk chair. Match different decorative styles. Ergonomic backrest fit the natural curve of the lower back and take the pain of spinal away from your body
Space Saving – You can flip the arms up and put the chair under the desk for saving space.Suitable for livingroom, study room, conference room and office
Breathable – High density mesh back, flexible supportive, breathable. Designed to support your lower back
Adjustable – Hbada home office task chair has a 120° tilt tension, pneumatic height adjustable from 16.5 inch to 19.5 inch, match different stature. Weight capacity: 250lb.
Stable & durable: Heavy duty base with smooth and silenced rolling casters, Max Capacity 250lbs
Customer Warranty Service: Hbada provides three years warranty that is processed in the most hassle-free way possible. Customer-first is the original aspiration of Hbada.No matter what problems you encounter during use, you can contact us. We will provide you with professional services on the product.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);

Price: $17.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:02:06 UTC – Details)

From the brand

LISEN electronic accessory stand helps us break the bad habit of looking down at the phone for a long time

Most comfortable height for the neck, shoulders and neck designed by German scientists according to ergonomics
Preserving a head-up or slightly upward gaze while using electronic devices can successfully avoid development of “text neck”
This new phone stand that is higher than the triangular phone base will be your most valuable product

LISEN New Stand Recommend

TALLER AND MORE PHOTOGENIC STAND, HELP TO CORRECT THE “TEXT NECK”: This cell phone stand holder is in accordance with ergonomic design. Providing you comfortable viewing angle which helps to fix your posture and reduce neck & back strain. The height can be easily adjusted between 7.1in-8.5in(1.4in adjustable range), the angle is adjustable between 5°~85°
USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: [No bent & tangling & tip over worries] when using while charging. Due to bent cable, the low phone dock maybe fall over. LISEN stylish adjustable phone holder for desk has a reserved charging hole design, supports cable management, [No bent & tangling & tip over worries]. This phone pad will not cover the subtitle when you watch the video
WEIGHTED ANTI-SLIP BASE: This cell phone stand for desk is equipped with a weighted base and an aluminum alloy rod. Therefore, this iPhone stand holder is stable enough to support all smartphones or small tablets, such as 2021 iPad Mini, iPhone 14 pro max 13 Pro/13 Mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/iPhone 11/11 Pro/Max/X/MAX/XR/8/8P, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, Note 10/9/8/Plus, S10/S9/S8, Kindel, Switch, iPad Mini,iPad Air, etc.We recommend the most stable compatible device size is 4-10 inchs
ANTI-SLIP DESIGN: The pad back and the bottom of this cell phone stand are fully covered by anti-skid silicone, which LISEN iPad stand holder can provide maximum protection for your device from any scratches and slides, grips friendly
WE CARE ABOUT YOU: If the product arrives broken, or get broken within 365 days, please directly contact LISEN for satisfied solution. Any other problem like could not tighten the screw, please also contact us. We sincerely care about every customer’s shopping experience! (Product including: phone stand*1, screw*1, hexagon screwdriver*1, specification*1)






LISEN electronic Accessories stand help to save the bad habit that we are spending more and more time bow head to looking on our mobile phones

  • Choosing LISEN electronic accessories stand, the most suitable height designed by German scientists based on ergonomic shoulder and neck
  • As long as you insist on using it for 1 hour a day, Keep hold head looking up at electronic devices
  • Can effectively alleviate the formation of our “text neck”, help our family enjoy the joy of playing with electronic devices while staying healthy
  • This new style mobile electronic stand will be your most valuable product, higher than triangular cell phone dock, Save you from the bad habit of head down playing phone!

Questions & Answers

Q1: Is this cell phone stands stable for a big phone and tablets?

Answer: Yes. this phone holder can support all cell phones. In addition, LISEN iPhone stand for desk can also stably adapt to small tablets less than 10 inchs, like 2021 iPad mini etc.

Q2: How tall is this cell phone stand holder?

Answer: The height of this desk phone stand is 1.4 inches adjustable, is flush with the face or slightly higher, so that you can be more calm and elegant during video calls.




Thoughtful Storage Base

Aesthetics of desk fashion With a storage base design, this iPhone stand holder can help to organize small things, such as airphones, rings, clips to avoid losing them.

Cable Organizer & Charging Hole

Featured with reserved charging hole and cable organizer circle, this cell phone holder stand is convenient for charging, and make your desk neat and tidy. No worry with cable tangling.

Full Covered Silicone Pad

Fully covered by soft silicone pad (back and feet), it can protect devices from scratch while 4 to 10 inch devices sitting comfortably. And it can support up to 0.53 inch thick phones with case.

Read more

return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}

Product Description

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life

CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual

*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225°, arm down 90° and base swivels 160 ° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Wide Application Desk Lamps for Home Office School for Reading Studying Working

Various Lighting Modes & Eye-Friendly LEDCUMKA table lamp has 5 color temperatures (from 3000K to 6000K), each with 10 brightness levels,which equals 50 modes, just easily and quickly via sensitive touch sensor switch to adjust. This led lamp is perfect for work,reading and study. Desk lamp with usb charging port has energy-saving full-spectrum LED beads with soft eye protection features to relieve eye fatigue,no flicker,no shadow characteristics,meeting your needs in different environments.
Auto Timer Setting & Memory FunctionCUMKA small desk lamp has 30/60 minutes automatic light off timer, even when you fall asleep under the reading lamp while reading at night, the set time will automatically turn off the light when it’s up, saving power. The led desk lamp also has a memory function that allows you to memorize the color and brightness of the light and adjust it freely, making it easy to store your personal settings for the next use.
Multi-Angle Adjustments & Space SavingThe head of the office desk lamp can be rotated 225°, the arm can be folded 90°, the swivel base can be rotated 160° ，making the lighting more flexible, so it can be adjusted to any lighting angle you need at a large angle. The base of the led desk lamps measure 7×4.3 inches, this office lighting takes up little space on the table, but it can light up a large area. The desk lights are perfect for use in living room, reading room, bedroom, office, etc.
Long Lifespan & After-Sales ServiceCUMKA wireless charging lamp have a lifespan of 50000 hours, never need replace a bulb,40 times longer than a typical incandescent light, reducing energy consumption and saving power, we also provide a power cable for faster and more stable charging. We offer a 12-month warranty, if you have any questions about the desk lamps, please contact us anytime.

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life


  • CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
  • Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
  • Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
  • Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
  • LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

【Memory Foam】Made of pure memory foam that adapts to your curves, provides superior comfort and helps with muscle fatigue. The premium memory foam never loses its shape and slowly rebounds to original shape after use.
【Friendly Design】Anti-slip rubber bottom prevents need for frequent readjustment. Built-in handle for easy portability. Removable cover makes cleaning easy. Additional mid-cover fabric to protect core foam. Breathable mesh cover allows air to circulate and prevents heat from collecting in the cushion.
【Ergonomic Design】 The ergonomically designed “U” shaped cushion helps to increase blood flow and support good gesture. Helps with muscle fatigue, leg tightness, and hamstring soreness. Popular with people who sit for more than 8 hours a day.
【Pain Relief Cushion】Place on any chair to provide extra support to your body to offload pressure on your spine, back, and sciatic nerve. Effectively relieve back, coccyx, sciatica, tailbone pain.
【Work with Any Chair】This ergonomic seat cushion provides comfort for people who sit in chairs and face screens all day. Great for office work, play games, watch movies, etc. If you travel by car, train or plane, but feel uncomfortable with the seat, this portable cushion will be your best travel partner. Bring extra comfort to your office, car, or chair!

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);

/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

if (!price) {
return false;

return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);

From the brand

YGYQZ: Make your mood neat

Storage shelf or bags bring us simple life

4 styles available

4 styles available

How did we get our start?

When I work in the office, I am often too busy to organize the items on the desktop, so that I spend a lot of time looking for the items I want. This feeling makes me very crazy, so I have designed many products, which tidy up my desktop, what’s more, beautify my office as an office decor.

What makes our products unique?

We have spent a long time conducting research, and combined with numerous customer feedback, we continue to improve and update our products. We have always been in the forefront, and we believe that we do better!

Why do we love what we do?

For efficiency

USPTO certified product

Solely designated patent for YGYQZ

Give your books a home: Is there nowhere to put your books, after a while, the book will fall apart, then your books become crumpled, with this small desktop bookshelf, your books will be able to maintain a new look
Saving desktop space in office: Are you still troubled by the clutter of your desk, using our desktop bookshelf can relieve your problems and make your desk tidy and look comfortable
Lightweight and easy to install: Thanks to the simple design, our desktop small bookshelf can be easily installed and disassembled and can be switched horizontally and vertically, you can decide to let the books lie down or stand at will
Perfect adjustable size: 25.6× 6.7× 15.1 in
Quality assurance: If there is a quality problem with the product,we will give you a refund,no need to return,if there is damage caused by non-human factors within 12 months,we will refund it for free
Since it is a factory direct sale, if there are scratches, please ask for replacement
If parts are missing, please ask for replacement
If there is no installation instruction, you can watch our video or ask us for directions


Cartoon cloud pattern bookshelf


Suitable for your books, pens, etc.

Give your books a place to put them, and you can also store some of your little items, so a simple desktop is no longer boring, and cluttered books are tidy. Providing the most comfortable learning office environment for people.We are committed to creating high-quality cloud pattern bookshelf, each of cloud pattern bookshelf has passed the test of time, you will enjoy a convenient and pleasant shopping experience.

New black cloud bookshelf




black cloud

Save your messy desktop.

black cloud side

Decorate your office or kitchen, everywhere you need to decorate is suitable

black cloud front

Make everything just organized

Read more



High quality cloud pvc board


Rounded design

Rounded corner grinding design, your child won’t get hurt.

You can extend it to make it longer or keep it shorter. It works perfectly on my office desk. Probably going to get one for home bathroom too.

  • Super easy to put together (literally took you about 5 minutes if that)
  • They are sturdy, though they may not look like it at times but i have a lot of heavy books on it so its ganna wobble a bit when they fall against the side. Its perfect for what i need it for.

High quality cloud pvc board

Features

Four patterns of bookshelves to choose

Durable

Simple

Waterproof

Cute

Easy assemble

Durable

Free stretch

  • Materials: PVC board
  • Style: Bear pattern, fawn pattern,white cloud pattern, black cloud pattern
  • Weight: 1.84 kg
  • Color: black, white
  • Size: 25.6× 6.7× 15.1 in
  • Box size: 15.98 x 9.41 x 3.39 in

Read more

High quality buyer’s show





Buyer’s picture1

For decorative tools and small things.

it serves its purpose as a cute shelf on my mom’s kitchen counter. She lives in a tiny space and this helps her to have more counter space for her various kitchen items. Relatively sturdy so far and easy to assemble.

Buyer’s picture2

For toys and dolls.

Easy instructions, I am using it to organize my dresser. Works well as I can adjust length. I haven’t finish organizing it, but it’s holding up my plushies as I finish organizing my closet. Easy to use and very sturdy!

Buyer’s picture3

For pens, plants and cosmetic.

Adorable. Holds my office supplies and cute decorations and doesn’t take up a ton of space on my desk. I love the adjustability of it.

Buyer’s picture4

For something to eat or use.

We wanted something clean looking that wasn’t made of metal. This looks great in our kitchen and there is no signal blockage. Super easy to put together.

Two colors available

  • Black is noble, white is innocence
  • The two colors match, your house or office will be more stylish
